articles.title: Wang Yi: China and India should be partners, not adversaries says foreign minister - BBC
articles.description: Yi's India visit comes days before PM Modi's trip to China, and signals a further thaw in relations.
articles.content:
Neyaz Farooquee and Meryl Sebastian
India and China should view each other as "partners" rather than "adversaries or threats", Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Monday, as he arrived for a tw… [+3254 chars]
